name: pollen (Ballon Plantsoen)
description:
Pollen is a small game made for the Brackeys game jam 2023. It followed the game jam's theme of "An end is a new beginning". Therefore, in pollen you shoot pollen out of full-grown dandelions, to create new plants. Dandelions show their beauty and afterwards they transform to create new beginnings.

To play Pollen, load the game in your browser. There are 2 modes; normal and hard. Both play the same; to win in normal you need to collect all flower colors. In hard you need to have all flower colors in your field.

To create colors; plant your flower close to a starflower and watch the colors merge. White flowers reset the color of your flower; so you can get all primary colors as well!

This game was made by Ballonplantsoen. All sprites and scripts are made by themselves. Music is made by Wampino and is literally called Magical forest thingy.
